text: 2.9 Sng 34.17-19, 1 Ko 10.13, Jud 6 Anɨb ak tek nep chɨn nopun, binɨb God nop gos nɨŋɨd kɨdek gɨpal okok, mɨŋel ogɨnap kɨlop apek, ne kɨlop dɨl kod yek, tap olap kɨlop gɨnɨmuŋ tek ma lup. Pen ne binɨb tap si tap tɨmel nep gɨpal okok kɨlop gek, mɨŋel dɨlɨg yul dɨnɨgabal. Mɨŋel dɨlɨg yul daknɨŋ, mɨdɨl mɨd dad amɨl, binɨb kɨlop tɨg asɨk bɨlokep ñɨn ak ownɨgab.
